text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- More than 30 politicians are expected to meet President Liamine Zeroual on Tuesday over parliamentary elections planned for the first half of this year.
- One year after a booby-trapped car blast outside the Press House in Algiers, journalists still remember the horror.
- Home-made bomb wounds four children in Sidi Moussa, near Algiers.
- Political parties say they have no information over talks with Zeroual on Tuesday.
- Independent committee to oversee elections will be main topic in the talks between President Zeroual and opposition parties.
- Three opposition parties stay away from talks with Zeroual over elections.
